name: Sheep Hurdle
description:
Part of Futuregames 2020 fall term game project 4

Sheep Herdle is a childrens 3D adventure platformer where you play as a dog herding sheep. Choose a colour for your dog and then start searching for all runaway sheep. Are the sheep running the wrong way? Just bark at them to scare them into ball form and push them wherever you want, or just play some football with them.

 

We enjoyed exploring and developing various mechanics, such as flow fields, shaders, and quirky VFX within Unreal Engine. Our greatest inspiration is Alpaca Stacka and herding games.

 

Our iconic sheep models, sprites, and vfx were in-house designs for this project.

Our intended target audience is 4-7 year olds.
